title: The Real Hut - Yuan Su Xiao Zhu
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Chinese, Japanese, Thai, Asian, Fusion, Korean
description: 原愫小筑 fusion vegetarian cafe est. 2014 serving a variety of Asian cuisines, from Thai soups and Japanese soba noodles to Taiwanese dumplings. Walking distance from Aljunied. Mar 2016 reported it's now operated by Kampung Senang organization.
